snippet.title: Like Them - Annoucement Trailer
snippet.description:
Like Them is an indie game inspired by the mechanics of Tomb of the Mask, crafted with passion by a solo developer from Brazil. 
🌟 WISHLIST ON STEAM: [https://store.steampowered.com/app/3442830/Like_Them/]

A fast-paced 2D puzzle game where you play as a cheerful ghost, moving in straight lines until hitting a wall. Navigate through a haunted house, dodge traps, evil ghosts, and escape before becoming like them! 

The game is currently in development, with exciting features and updates being added as we work toward the full release!

💬 What do you think of the trailer? Let us know in the comments!
👍 If you liked the trailer, give it a thumbs up and subscribe for more updates.
🔔 Turn on notifications to be the first to see new updates and devlogs of Like Them development process. 

#indiegame  #puzzlegame  #arcadegames #tombofthemask  #retrogaming  #fastpacedgames  #steamgames  #newindiegames2021 #gaming2025  #indiegamedev #brasilgames #gamedevelopment
